channel.title: !~~!Looking for a LoaScape Team!~~!
channel.description:
Hello..i am working on a project called LoaScape using a RS2 server. If you would like to join my developing team please reply here and email me. Here is the site.
I am looking for:
Coders(People who know ALOT about coding)
People who can edit the maps(add buildings and stuff)
Mods(not hiring until i realease the game)
Sponser(someone who can advertise.)
GFX design(someone who can make logos, banners and a client picture when its loading for Loascape)
(The pic on the top of the my site is awful)

item.title: !~~!Looking for a LoaScape Team!~~!
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Wouldn’t it be illegal to take RuneScape’s game and take it as your own and release it as a seperate game with new buildings and characters

Read full topic
